member.name: M:RacersDB.Program.Functionality.RacerQuery(RacersDB.Logic.GetLogic)
member.summary: This method returns all data of the Racers, who was born the same year as a Racetrack was built. This list is ordered by the name of Racetracks.

member.name: M:RacersDB.Program.Functionality.RacetrackQuery(RacersDB.Logic.GetLogic)
member.summary: This method collects all data of all Racetracks and sorts descending based on the amount of Races organized on each Racetracks.

member.name: M:RacersDB.Program.Functionality.ConsoleWrite(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is the default WriteLine() method, used by all of this methods, inside class.
member.param: This is the string, which will be wrote to the screen.
If this bool is true, the method breaks the line after WriteLine, if it's false, then not.
